data.message: Facebook, why do you never respond to my comments??? I keep asking a question but never get an answer.....yet all these other comments are getting answers.....WHAT UP WITH THAT? :/ My question is, is there a way to keep friends from seeing what you like and comment on showing up on their homepage? And if not, can you make it a feature, at least?

replies.message: Hi Arron. Thanks for the feedback on privacy settings concerning comments and likes. We're always open to input from the community. If you have thoughts on how to improve a Facebook feature, please fill out this feedback form. http://bit.ly/2e4NVee. -Nick
Facebook So......there IS no way then?.....Okay....well I sent the feedback.....hopefully it's looked into and changed.
we can be friend i hope kindness friend an loyal goodsblessed u
